title: How long does it take to find a full team in Team builder?
body: I miss draft pick, because it only took like 3 minutes to find a game team builder takes forever!{{item:3070}}

replies.body: They need to bring back draft pick  just for the small servers like us
Was in one last night, got in once, 3 other people didn't accept. waited a total of 1 hour, bugger it ill just try and get mid. got mid in blind pick and was against a TF main -_-

it used to be a bit longer than regular normals early on.  Then as it took a bit longer, more people abandoned it, till it got so bad that almost everyone abandoned it.  WHich was a pity, as it was so much less ragey.  (and outside of the Feral flare era i could get a queue as jungle quite fast)

In bigger regions its working ok, apparently.

Unless you want to support jg or marksman support or mage jg(e.g. Ahri) then your Que time for TB will be for ages. (fair few hours)

I personally think they should remove TB and bring back Dominion even if it is only on like Twisted Treeline limited time.
3 hours for me and then I gave up. Was at peak hours too.
Last I tried it took 30 minutes just to get 3 people, then we decided to f*ck it and queue together for blind.
